definition: To experience the cessation of vital bodily functions due to exposure to extreme cold temperatures, resulting in the loss of life. This term is commonly employed to describe the unfortunate outcome of prolonged exposure to freezing conditions.

examples.english: I am freezing from the cold.

examples.german: Wenn du nicht aufpasst, wirst du erfrieren.
examples.english: If you don't be careful, you will freeze to death.

examples.german: Die Obdachlosen erfrieren auf der Straße.
examples.english: The homeless people freeze on the street.

examples.german: Er konnte nicht mehr weitergehen und erfroor.
examples.english: He couldn't go on anymore and froze to death.
